author: SteveL-MSFT
body:
https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/docs/git/README.md

Currently it covers how to work from a branch, but not how to work from a fork, setup remotes correctly and keep fork in sync with upstream

comments.author: lzybkr
comments.body: That document was meant to document our specific workflow, not general git setup. Github already has good documentation on working from a fork: https://help.github.com/articles/fork-a-repo/

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: @lzybkr I was following the GitHub documentation, but @vors was recommending something different

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: I'm closing this and recommend using the GitHub documentation

title: Update git docs on how to work from a fork
